name: Xarxa FP
goal:
Xarxa FP is a non-profit association of European cities with the mission to improve quality of Vocational Education and Training (VET) across Europe by developing common mobility strategies among cities aimed at VET students and professionals and promoting strategic partnerships through international VET projects.
Xarxa FP promotes work-based learning experiences across Europe for both VET students and professionals.
Xarxa FP seeks to become a reference organisation within the area of European mobility by promoting and innovating Vocational Education and Training in line with the EU’s strategic priorities.
interests: Budget, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU Vocational Education and Training policies
Erasmus+ Programme
European Alliance for Apprenticeships
